summary: AI-powered SaaS platform for short-form content creators - generates original, monetization-ready, algorithm-optimized content strategies with tiered subscription access (Free, Pro, Elite). Features trend analysis, brand voice memory, content scoring, and revenue optimization while maintaining strict copyright compliance.
architectural_notes: Tiered access control system required: Free (3 hooks only), Pro (hooks/scripts/captions/hashtags/1 monetization angle), Elite (full suite + calendar + roadmap)
Payment processing via Stripe and PayPal - no direct payment handling or financial data storage by AI
Content generation based on user inputs: Tone, Audience, Platform, Niche, Goal
Copyright compliance layer must prevent copying real creators, lyrics, trademarks, or IP
Subscription-based feature gating determines content access externally

existing_features.title: Build authentication system using Internet Identity to identify users and link them to their subscription tier and content generation history

Create content output display component showing generated results in clear sections: Scroll-Stopping Hooks, Original Scripts, Engagement Captions, Hashtag Clusters, Monetization Angles, Psychological Trigger Breakdown, Posting Frequency Recommendation, Audience Pain Points, Content Score Report, and Optional Faceless Version, with tier-based feature gating

Create content score display component showing Hook Strength Score, Retention Potential Score, Monetization Potential Score (all 1-10 numeric scales), and Virality Probability Explanation with visual indicators (progress bars or gauges)
Create upgrade encouragement component for Free tier users showing locked features with prominent upgrade CTA when they attempt to access Pro or Elite content sections

Display legal compliance disclaimers on content output pages stating that all generated content is original, users retain commercial rights, AI assistance does not guarantee growth or income, and outputs avoid copyrighted material

Apply a cohesive visual design system across the entire platform using a modern, professional aesthetic suitable for a SaaS content creation tool, with a distinctive color palette (avoid blue and purple), contemporary typography, and polished UI patterns that convey credibility and creative energy
Create a Stripe configuration setup page in the frontend that prompts for Stripe API keys (publishable and secret) and webhook signing secret when Stripe is not yet configured
Update the PricingPage component to initiate Stripe checkout when an authenticated user selects a paid tier, redirecting them to the Stripe-hosted checkout page
Update the SubscriptionManagement page to display current Stripe subscription details and add a 'Manage Billing' button that opens the Stripe customer portal
